plot: Set in Thailand in April 2010, the confrontations between anti-government protesters and the army are intensifying. Violence emerges at a time normally reserved for the Songkran festival, an annual explosion of happiness.
title: Just Add Water
plot_es: Set in Thailand in April 2010, the confrontations between anti-government protesters and the army are intensifying. Violence emerges at a time normally reserved for the Songkran festival, an annual explosion of happiness.
plot_en: Set in Thailand in April 2010, the confrontations between anti-government protesters and the army are intensifying. Violence emerges at a time normally reserved for the Songkran festival, an annual explosion of happiness.
